title: Full Stack Software Developer
pitch: I build accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for the web.
about: Software Developer, coming from an Electrical technology background with a first-class honor degree; I m familiar with the sort of fast-paced, intense environment found in a lot of Software industries, problem-solving skills, effective communication, and more I now use every day as a developer and professional. with a love for clean code and accessible design. I am addicted to programming and remote work and capable of ramping up quickly and efficiently.
contactCta: If you have an application you are intersted in developing, a feature that you need built or a project that needs coding. I'd love to help with it.
name: Name
expDescription1: Re-write some old legacy code into a new and up-to-date format to improve users' experience. Fixing Bugs and enhancing the user experience on the platform
expDescription2: Work alongside the Engineering team to develop software for digital health and AI adoption.
expDescription3: Ensuring the quality of source code and conducting code and UI reviews. Proposed improvements to code organization to improve code quality
expDescription4: Mentored junior web developers, providing technical support through code reviews. Provided advice and tips on how to maintain motivation and longevity in the program
